REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0703 reute r f BC-(CORRECTED)---BANCO-D 03-23 0057

TEXT.TITLE: (CORRECTED) - BANCO DI ROMA UNIT ARRANGES
TEXT.BODY: Banco di Roma (London branch) has arranged a 200 mln dlr Euro-certificate of deposit program, Swiss Bank Corporation International Ltd said as sole dealer. The borrower also will have the option to issue certificates in other available currencies, including sterling. REUTER
